Comment: This is a game I played recently. I should have won but didn't play it right. This shows how not to win a Bishop V knight ending when you have the bishop. I hope you can learn from my mistakes. I know I have.

I decide to exchange looking for a bishop v Knight endgame. The only risk is that His king is centralized and that may turn out to be an advantage. But if I get the d-file I keep the king from the queenside which is where the pawns will determine the victor
